title: Reliance ready for next level of renewables-focused growth
description: Reliance Industries announced plans to become India's top renewable energy developer, aiming for 100 GW of installations by 2030. The company detailed significant investments in solar photovoltaic manufacturing at its Jamnagar facility, where production will start by December. Reliance is also exploring partnerships to enhance its green energy capabilities, aligning with its net zero carbon goal by 2035.
